\w And|strong="H6430"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*: \w From|strong="H5973"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* day \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H0589"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w blameless|strong="H5352"\w* \w in|strong="H0559"\w* \w what|strong="H7451"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* evils.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H0259"\w* \w went|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w caught|strong="H3920"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w foxes|strong="H7776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* coupled \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w tail|strong="H2180"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* fastened \w torches|strong="H3940"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w tails|strong="H2180"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* setting \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* foxes \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, \w that|strong="H0784"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* might run about hither \w and|strong="H7971"\w* thither. \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* presently went into \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w standing|strong="H7054"\w* corn \w of|strong="H3754"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*. \w Which|strong="H0784"\w* being \w set|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, both \w the|strong="H5704"\w* corn \w that|strong="H0784"\w* \w was|strong="H6430"\w* already carried together, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H0784"\w* \w which|strong="H0784"\w* \w was|strong="H6430"\w* \w yet|strong="H5704"\w* \w standing|strong="H7054"\w*, \w was|strong="H6430"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* burnt, insomuch, \w that|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w flame|strong="H0784"\w* \w consumed|strong="H1197"\w* \w also|strong="H6430"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* oliveyards.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w thing|strong="H2063"\w*? \w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H0802"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w in|strong="H0802"\w* law \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Thamnathite, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w another|strong="H0802"\w*, hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* things. \w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5927"\w* both \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w made|strong="H5221"\w* \w a|strong="H5221"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w so|strong="H3381"\w* \w that|strong="H1419"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* astonishment \w they|strong="H5921"\w* laid \w the|strong="H0853"\w* calf \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w leg|strong="H7785"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w*. \w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w going|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H5221"\w* cavern \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* \w Etam|strong="H5862"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w finding|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w jawbone|strong="H3895"\w*, even \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w jawbone|strong="H3895"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w an|strong="H5221"\w* ass which \w lay|strong="H7971"\w* \w there|strong="H4672"\w*, catching \w it|strong="H3947"\w* up, \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* therewith \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w With|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w jawbone|strong="H3895"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w an|strong="H5221"\w* ass, \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w jaw|strong="H3895"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* colt \w of|strong="H0376"\w* asses \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* \w a|strong="H5221"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.
